title: “Amenity Component” shall mean any constructed amenities, prescribed by C
clause_text: “Amenity Component” shall mean any constructed amenities, prescribed by C.E.O., S.R.A. for rehabilitation of the hutment dwellers in any S.R.S.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: “Amenity Component” shall mean any constructed amenities, prescribed by C.E.O., S.R.A. for rehabilitation of the hutment dwellers in any S.R.S.
